report.title: EBMS My Walks: Walks relevant for an Indicia user
report.description: A list of top level samples for use in the EBMS My Walks report calendar grid - walks created by the user, or created by others on locations allocated to the user. Filtered according to the Indicia ID of the user, and optional location ID. Top level means that the parent_id field of the samples is null.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id = s.survey_id AND su.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON l.id=lav.location_id AND lav.deleted=false AND lav.location_attribute_id=#alloc_id# AND lav.int_value=#cms_user_id# #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND su.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND (s.created_by_id=#user_id# OR lav.id IS NOT NULL) #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: alloc_id
param.description: Select the attribute used to allocation locations to the user

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: cms_user_id
param.description: Enter the CMS ID of the user
